SEARCH
Package a02.project.com.cube

Class RubiksCube

java.lang.Object
a02.project.com.cube.RubiksCube
public class RubiksCube extends Object
The `RubiksCube` class represents a Rubik's Cube and provides methods to initialize, manipulate, and solve the cube. It uses a 3-dimensional array to store the colors of the cube's squares and provides methods to rotate different parts of the cube. Fields: - fullCube: A 3-dimensional array representing the Rubik's Cube. - savedMoves: A list to store the moves made on the Rubik's Cube.

    • solveCube

      public static void solveCube(List<String> savedMoves, String[][][] cube)
      Reverses the effect of the moves stored in the 'savedMoves' list on the Rubik's Cube.
      Parameters:
      savedMoves - A list of moves that have been performed on the Rubik's Cube.
      cube - A 3-dimensional array representing the Rubik's Cube.

    • scrambleCube

      public static void scrambleCube(String[][][] cube, List<String> savedMoves)
      Randomly scrambles the Rubik's cube by making 80 random moves.
      Parameters:
      cube - The 3D array representing the Rubik's cube.
      savedMoves - A list to store the moves made during the scrambling process.

    • makeMove

      public static void makeMove(String[][][] cube, String move, List<String> savedMoves)
      Makes a move on the Rubik's Cube by rotating the cube's faces or sides based on the given move. It updates the cube's state and adds the move to the list of saved moves.
      Parameters:
      cube - The 3D array representing the Rubik's Cube.
      move - The move to be made on the cube.
      savedMoves - The list to store the moves made on the cube.

    • printIfCubeIsSolved

      public static void printIfCubeIsSolved(String[][][] cube)
      Checks if the Rubik's Cube is solved and prints a congratulatory message if it is.
      Parameters:
      cube - The Rubik's Cube represented as a 3D array.

    • checkIfSolved

      public static boolean checkIfSolved(String[][][] cube)
      Checks if a Rubik's Cube is solved by comparing the color of each sticker on each face of the cube with the color of the sticker in the top-left corner of that face.
      Parameters:
      cube - a 3D array representing the Rubik's Cube, where each element represents the color of a sticker on the cube
      Returns:
      true if the Rubik's Cube is solved (all stickers have the same color on each face), false otherwise
